title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.71 - Current liability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.71 - Current liability

State Regulations
A short-term debt, regardless of its source, including
any liability accrued and deferred and unearned revenue that is to be paid out
of current assets or is to be transferred to income within a relatively short
period, usually one year or less, or a period greater than a year but within
the business cycle of an enterprise. The currently maturing portion of
long-term debt is thus classified. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.71

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
